extendedInfo.description: Theme Name:                         Windows 8 Metro  HD ThemeMain features:    Covers new wallpaper, icons                              Make sure your phone with android OS 4.0+If you have some particular themes in your mind, just tell us by emails or make more comments, we can make one for you.Besides,if you want to find some other themes of our team,please click "More from developer".We hope you can find you themes there.What's more, remember to email us for any problems before giving a bad review.  and we will check our email box everyday and we will appreciate your kindly feedback!Do not forget it is free and it keeps free forever.and thank you for downloading this theme and we hope you can enjoy it!TAGS:Windows 8 Metro  Theme  Windows 8 Metro  Live Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro  Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro  Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro  Icon Pack  Windows 8 Metro  Theme Free; Windows 8 Metro  hd Theme  Windows 8 Metro  hd Live Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro   hd Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro  hd Wallpaper  Windows 8 Metro  hd Icon Pack  Windows 8 Metro  hd Theme Free
